# posthog Provider

The PostHog provider manages Insights via the public REST API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "posthog" {
  host       = "https://us.posthog.com"
  api_key    = var.posthog_api_key
  project_id = var.posthog_project_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) PostHog personal API key. Can also be set via `POSTHOG_API_KEY`.
- `host` (String) Base URL for the PostHog API. Defaults to `https://us.posthog.com`. Can also be set via `POSTHOG_HOST`.
- `project_id` (String) Default project (environment) ID used by managed resources. Can also be set via `POSTHOG_PROJECT_ID`.
